description: Try our easy to follow Ham And Pea Pasta Bake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Ham And Pea Pasta Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 L Campbell's Real Chicken Liquid Stock

recipeInstructions.text: Heat butter in a large pan over medium-high heat. Add flour and cook for 1 min. Gradually stir in stock. Bring to the boil. Simmer for 5 mins. Stir in pasta, ham, peas and 1/2 cup of cheese. Spoon into dish. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Bake for 15-20 mins until golden.

Heat butter in a large pan over medium-high heat. Add flour and cook for 1 min. Gradually stir in stock. Bring to the boil. Simmer for 5 mins. Stir in pasta, ham, peas and 1/2 cup of cheese. Spoon into dish. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Bake for 15-20 mins until golden.
